value.description: Jacob Hafter, representing the family of D'Andre Berghardt Jr., said Clark County District Attorney Steve Wolfson has the results of a Las Vegas police investigation but doesn't have jurisdiction ...

value.description: The service for D'Andre Berghardt Jr. will begin at 11 a.m. Monday at Nehemiah Ministries Christian Church, with burial to follow at Palm Downtown Cemetery. Berghardt was moving from Los Angeles ...
